title: Drawing, "Textile Design:  Marsblume", designed 1923
medium: Brush and gouache, plan and black ink, graphite on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink on mount, lower right: Dessin; inscribed in blue crayon on mount, upper right: 13 "Marsblume"; stamped in red on mount, lower right corner: ?
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds
description: Large abstracted mauve and pale pink  flower with circular_______ and long thin bi-colored petals on short stem with three floating bi-colored zinnia type flowers on short stem.  All on light taupe background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design:  Marsblume", designed 1923.
designed 1923. Brush and gouache, plan and black ink, graphite on paper. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Collections Acquisition and Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Funds. 1988-62-860.
